Key Match Events: The Guardians made a late game comeback to win 7-5.
Bo Naylor hit a leadoff homer in the seventh inning.
Jhonkensy Noel hit a go-ahead RBI single.
Emmanuel Clase recorded his American League-best 39th save, lowering his ERA to 0.58.
Post-Match Reflections: Guardians manager Stephen Vogt emphasized the importance of the comeback win for the team's morale.
Tanner Bibee expressed confidence in the team's ability to overcome struggles and improve.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians avoided being swept by the Royals in four games for the first time since June 1973.
Andrés Giménez made a crucial defensive play to maintain the momentum.
